name: Space Run - LD42 Compo
description:
Ludum Dare:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/space-run

# About

  • Engine: GameMaker Studio 2
  • Pixelart: Aseprite
  • Sound: BFXR

Space Run is about running from planet to planet towards the edge of the universe. Avoid obstacles, gain XP and unlock upgrades. Your view shrinks as you are damaged.
